
## Effective Depth

```{r effective-depth, echo = FALSE}
# expects parameters file1, file2, type1, type2
ed1 = read_ed(file1, type1)
ed2 = read_ed(file2, type2)
ed.diff = diff_ed(ed1, ed2)
ed.rmse.station = rmse_ed(ed.diff, "Station")
ed.rmse.time = rmse_ed(ed.diff, "Time")

ed.diff %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = diff_ed) + geom_boxplot() +
  ylab("Difference") +
  ggtitle("Effective Depth Differences at Stations")
ed.rmse.station %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Station, y = rmse_ed) +
  geom_col() + ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Effective Depth RMSE at Stations")
ed.rmse.time %>% mutate(Time = as.POSIXct(Time, format = "%d%b%Y %M:%S",
    tz = "UTC")) %>% ggplot() + plot.theme +
  aes(x = Time, y = rmse_ed) + geom_line() +
  scale_x_datetime(date_labels = "%b %Y") + 
  ylab("RMSE") +
  ggtitle("Effective Depth RMSE Through Time")
```
